attributes.action: Allow refugee status to white South Africans who are being persecuted.
attributes.additional_details: Legislation passed to support the seizure of farm land.
attributes.background: White farmers are being murdered in their homes and the ANC have just passed legislation to seize their land without compensation.

rejection.details:
People can already claim asylum if they have left their country and are unable to go back because they fear persecution.

You can find out more:

https://www.gov.uk/claim-asylum
